    • Uses of AssertionCheck in com.wiris.quizzes.api

      Methods in com.wiris.quizzes.api that return AssertionCheck 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AssertionCheck[] QuestionInstance.getAssertionChecks(int correctAnswer, int studentAnswer)
      Deprecated. 
      Use QuestionInstance.getChecks(Slot, AuthorAnswer) instead.
      AssertionCheck[] QuestionInstance.getChecks(Slot slot, AuthorAnswer authorAnswer)
      Returns the evaluation of the set of assertions resulting of using the grading criteria contained in the AuthorAnswer object to grade the answer entered into a given Slot.
